TopicTitle: Not new to the forums or game, but I'm back after a looooong break!

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I would just like to say hello again! I have been away for quite a while because I didn't play much KSP. I started playing in March 2012 which was over 2 years ago and now I started to play more. What are some of the new features of the game? (I stopped playing at around 0.19 I think)

How can I get started again? I haven't played for a while and I would like to get some rockets back up in space!
Welcome Back! Now we have Science! Biomes! 3.75m Parts! CAREER MODE!

Welcome Back! Now we have Science! Biomes! 3.75m Parts! CAREER MODE!

Oh yes I saw that! What's better to start at, career mode or sandbox? I want to get back into the game as I said but I don't know where to start .
Start at career. It will make you get better.

Oh yes I saw that! What's better to start at, career mode or sandbox? I want to get back into the game as I said but I don't know where to start .

Career limits your options and makes you think outside the box, start there.
Yep, i'd agree with starting in career mode. It's how I got re-acquainted with KSP after a long break. Then go sandbox and go nuts. Welcome back to the fold.
Welcome back! Go catch an ASTEROID OR TWO. (Hint, hint)
